alert.note: Alert for Gallatin Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 09 at 10:54AM MDT until April 11 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: .Warm temperatures may melt snowpack and increase river flows. ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt is possible. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Montana, including the following area, Gallatin Valley. * WHEN...Through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
